snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is nearly doubling the number of investigators assigned to narcotics teams around New York to fight the growing drug issue.
abstract: New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo is adding one hundred State Police investigators to drug units around New York, with mandate to tackle growing heroin problem in state; new officers will nearly double number of investigators assigned to narcotics teams that work with local police agencies on drug enforcement.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Jesse McKinley contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is nearly doubling the number of investigators assigned to narcotics teams around New York to fight the growing drug issue.

headline.main: Cuomo Adds 100 Officers to Units Fighting Heroin
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Adds 100 Officers to Units Fighting Heroin
